function.name: GetRCLine
function.description: Gets an unparsed string from the configuration database.

parameter.name: pszKeyName
parameter.description: Name of the key to retrieve.

parameter.name: pszBuffer
parameter.description: Buffer that receives the retrieved string. If the string is too large to fit in the buffer, it is truncated.

parameter.name: cbBuffer
parameter.description: Size of the buffer in bytes.

parameter.name: pszDefault
parameter.description: Default string. If the key cannot be found in the configuration database, GetRCLine copies this string into the buffer. If this parameter is NULL, it is treated as an empty string.

return.description: If the key is found in the configuration database, the return value is nonzero. If the key cannot be found, the return value is zero.

remarks.p: Unlike GetRCString, GetRCLine retrieves an unparsed string from the configuration database. Use GetRCLine when the value of a key is an application or bang command to execute.
GetRCLine can also be used to implement custom data types, by parsing the retrieved string yourself.
